その虚勢 いつまで\n保つかなァー？ ひゃは！:
How long will your
bluff hold, hm? Hyaha!
選ばれし原石たる 俺が\nおされてるだとォ！？:
Me, a Primestone...
Reduced to this!?
お前なんかにボクらの心は 砕けない！:
You'll pay for
what you did!
天に仇なすものに裁きの剣を！:
To heaven's defilers,
the sword of judgment!
しつこいですね！でも 負けませんっ！:
Persistent! But we
won't give in!
我が 剣技の真髄とくと見よ！:
Behold the essence
of my swordsmanship!
示してみるがよい\n神化とやらの チカラを:
Show me the power
of deification.
よくやる 羽虫にしては\nしかし ここまでだ:
Not bad, for insects.
But that is far enough.
勝って みんなで帰りましょう！:
Let us win and
return home!
よいぞ もっと楽しませろ\n貴様らが あがく姿でな:
Very well. I shall
enjoy your struggle...
せめてもの慈悲だ\n一瞬で 塵にしてやろう:
I will show mercy,
and turn you to dust.
私が あなたを導きます！:
I will be your
guiding way!
貴様らは よく戦った\nだが 終わりの時だ:
You all fought well...
But the end is nigh.
よもや余を破壊するとは\n貴様らのチカラは……:
You dare destroy me
with your power...?
私が あなたの道を 切り拓く……！:
I will pave your
path forward...!
我が念晶体 貴様らが\nキズつけることはかなわぬ:
Your attacks cannot
harm my telecrystal.
再び絶望を与えよう！\nかの日を思いだすがいい！:
See despair once more!
Remember that day!
だがそれは我も同じこと！\n……全力でゆくぞ！:
But so am I! Behold my
true power!
クックックッ……\nそれほどのチカラを得たか:
Heh, heh... So you're
that much stronger...
クククッ……面白い！\n少々本気でゆくぞ！:
How interesting! I'll
get a bit serious!
神化の儀を受け お前も\nこのチカラを手にしろ！:
You too must receive
this godly power!
お前にも 神のチカラの\n一端を見せてやろう！:
I will show you but a
taste!
今度こそ 終わりだ！\n神のチカラに 震えろ！:
This ends here!
Tremble before a god!
甘く見るなよ\nまだまだ 序のクチだ！:
Do not underestimate
me! This begins now!
強情な奴め！\nもはや 手加減せぬぞ！:
You stubborn...! I
will not hold back!
我がチカラの神髄\nとくと見よ！！:
Behold the meaning
of my power!
眠レル三闘士像ヨ！\n閃光ノ雷ヲ！:
SLEEPING TRIAD STATUE!
FLASH OF THUNDER!
滅びは必然……\nいっそ この手で……:
Inevitable destruction
by my own hands...
眠レル三闘士像ヨ！\n大地ノ震天ヲ！:
SLEEPING TRIAD STATUE!
SHAKE THE EARTH!
眠レル三闘士像ヨ！\n賢哲ノ護リヲ！:
SLEEPING TRIAD STATUE!
SHIELD OF WISDOM!
けがらわしい血もろとも\n根絶やしに してくれる！:
Your vile blood
will be erased!
当代の盟友ってのが\nどんなもんか見せてみな！:
Show me what kind of
ally you really are!
やるじゃねえか……だが\nこっからが本番だぜ！:
Not bad...but the real
deal starts now!
どいつもこいつも\n俺の邪魔をするな！:
Don't any of you
get in my way!
後悔させてやろう\nその愚かな判断をな！:
You will regret your
foolish decision!
なかなかに楽しいぞ\nしかし もう終わらせよう:
How enjoyable... But
this ends now.
悪くない抵抗だ\nさて どうかな これは？:
Not bad. How will you
handle this?
なかなかに 楽しめたぞ\nだが 遊びは終わりだ:
How enjoyable... But
playtime is over now.
不完全な存在ごときが\n俺に触れるな！:
Do not touch me, you
imperfect beings!
俺こそが 福音！\n邪魔をするなッ！！:
I am gospel! Do not
interfere!!
勇者 盟友 人間……\n何もかも 無に帰せ！！:
Hero, ally, humans...
I'll erase them all!!
アハハッ！ あわれな羽虫\n実力の差 わからないの？\t:
Ahaha! You believe
you can match us?
うっとうしい 下等種族！\n相手してあげる 本気で！:
Primitive species!
Time to get serious!
低俗な 下等種族ども\n思い知れ ルーベの痛み！:
You primitive species!
Know Rubay's pain!
どうした みじめな羽虫？\nキズひとつ つけられずに:
Well, puny insects?
You cannot do us harm.
滅せよ 滅せよ 滅せよ！\n我は滅びの絶対神なり！！:
Perish!! I am the
Absolute Annihilator!!
これがルティアナの……\n絆のチカラだというのか:
This is Lutiana's...
power of unity?
おのれ寄せ集めが！\n塵芥ごときがッ！:
Insignificant lot! You
are but mere specks!
光を統べるは闇である！:
It is darkness that
rules over the light!
我が闇の中で息絶えよ！:
My darkness will snuff
you out!
すごいチカラだね……\nなら これで どうかな？:
Your power's amazing...
But how about this?
さすがだね……これが\nキミのチカラなのか:
No wonder... So that's
your power...
さぁ 楽しいショーの\nはじまり はじまり～♪:
Now, let the fun show
begin! ♪
ふふっ みんなで\n幸せになりましょう？:
Hmm hmm... Let's be
happy together, okay?
どうシテ？ コンなニモ\n素晴ラしい場所ナノニ……:
wHy? Is thIS place
noT wOnderFUL...?
俺たチハ お前のタメに\n言ってるんダゾ！:
We'RE saYinG THis
For youR sake!
ふ……つい 興が乗った。\nここまでにしておこう。:
I got a bit carried
away... Let's stop.
ウォルドの聖簾を守る\nそれが ラキの役目！:
Protecting Angelfall,
that is Raki's duty!
うるさい うるさい！\nおまえたちは 去れ！:
Shut up, shut up!
Go away!!
ふ！ ふ！ ふ！\n面白くなってきた！:
Heh! Heh! Heh!
How very interesting!
まずは お手並み拝見:
Now, let's see what
you can do!
存外やるものですね\nでは とっておきですよ？:
How surprising! Here,
a treat for you!
見せていただきましょうか\n神のチカラとやらをッ！:
Show me this godly
power of yours!!
おあそびはここまでです\n我が主のチカラを見よッ！:
No more games. Behold
my master's power!
よくも我が主の前で……\nたたきつぶしてくれるッ！:
How dare you, in front
my master?! DIE!!
あり得ない…… これ以上\n醜態をさらすわけには……:
This can't be...
I am a disgrace...
私も 手合わせ願おう\n大魔王どの……いくぞ！:
I'd like to challenge
 you too. Come on!
我が 絶対零度の刃\n耐えてみせろ！:
Show me that you can
survive my icy blade!
やれやれ……\n犬ッコロも 相手とはな:
Well, now...even the
doggy wants to play.
ああ 面倒だ 面倒だ……\n終わらせてやるッ！:
Ah, what a pain...
Time to end this!
我が主から たまわった\n身体にキズが……殺す。:
Wounds on my master's
body...I'll kill you.
殺す 殺す 殺す……\n主のため こいつを殺す！:
I WILL KILL YOU...!
FOR MY MASTER!
わたしは 世界に\n終わりをもたらす者……:
I am that which will
end this world...
ペダルを踏んでから\n左へ糸を移動させます:
Push the pedal, then
thread to the left.
左へ 続けて 右へ\n糸を移動させてください:
Please thread left
and then right.
ああ…… すみません\n時間切れで 失敗です:
Ah...sorry, but you
ran out of time.
ペダルを踏んでから\n右へ糸を移動させます:
Push the pedal, then
thread to the right.
ペダルを踏んで 手前に\nそして右へ糸を移動です:
Pedal and strum,
then thread right.
右へ糸を移動させ\nペダルを踏み 糸を右へ:
Thread right, pedal,
then thread right.
右と左に 糸を移動させ\nペダルを踏んでください:
Thread right and
left, then pedal.
左と右に 糸を移動させ\nペダルを踏んでください:
Thread left and
right, then pedal.
手前に打って 糸を右へ\nそしてペダルを踏みます:
Strum, thread right,
then use the pedal.
右へ糸を移動させて\n手前に打って:
Thread right, then
strum the front.
ペダルを踏んでから\n右へ糸を移動させて:
Push the pedal, then
thread to the right.
手前に打ってから\nペダルを踏んで:
Strum the front,
then push the pedal.
糸を右へ ペダルを踏み\nもう一度 糸を右へ！:
Thread right, pedal,
then right again!
ペダルを踏んで 手前に\n最後は 右へ糸を移動！:
Pedal, then strum,
then thread right!
手前に打って 糸を右へ\n最後にペダルを踏んで！:
Strum, thread right,
then use the pedal!
えーっと 読めない……\n上から順に ３つかな！:
I can't read this...
In order, I guess!?
再生の詩を届けますわ！\nどうか耐え抜いて……！:
My song of renewal!
Please stay strong!
ここからは雪原か……\n古傷が痛まんといいが:
A snowfield...? I hope
old wounds won't ache.
魂の燭台を探さねば。\n……行くぞ:
We must find your
Candelabra. Come on.
いいぞぉ その調子だ！\nガンガンいこうぜぇ！:
Nice! Just like that!
Give it all ya got!
ここが 正念場だよっ！\n気合いを 入れな！:
The moment of truth!
I'm all pumped up!
もう ひと息だよ……！\nがんばって！:
Just a bit more...!
You can do it!
緑豊かな 大地が\n見る間に荒れ果てて…:
The lush, green land
is wasting away...
ドワーフは 発展のため\n大陸の自然を 破壊した:
All this was destroyed
for growth's sake.
何千年も経った 今も\n緑の大地は返ってこない:
That green land still
hasn't come back.
きっとこれも三闘士像が\n見てきた 景色なのね…:
This must be what the
Triad saw, too...
ここは…？ かなりの\n文明国のようですが…:
Where are we? It seems
quite civilized...
まさか この目で\n見ることがかなうなんて:
Never thought I'd ever
see it for real!
帰ったら このことを\n論文に 書こうかしら…:
Maybe I'll write a
paper about this...
…っと いけない。今は\n三闘士様を探さなくちゃ:
No...right now we have
to find the Triad.
町の連中が人形だなんて\n今でも信じられねえよな:
I can't believe
they're all dolls...
人形の身体で\n永遠に生き続ける…:
To be able to live
forever as a doll...
それは本当に幸せと\n言えるのでしょうか…:
Can you really say
that's happiness...?
禁足地 ウォルド地方は\nどんな土地なのかしら？:
I wonder what this
region is like?
ゼニアス西部の調査\nスタートだよ 隊長！:
Time to start the
exploration, captain!
うん……でも まずは\n呪いの源を見つけよう！:
Yeah...but first, the
source of the curse!
大きな女神像って 扉を\n開ける係だったんだ。:
So those statues
opened that door.
おそらく 呪いの源は\nこの奥に……。:
Perhaps the curse's
source is back here...
気を引き締めて\nいきましょう みんな。:
Let's stay focused
and keep going.
まだまだこれからだぜ？\n気張っていけよ！:
This is just the
beginning, ya know!
もうひとふんばりだ！\n油断してくたばるなよ？:
Don't let your guard
down and die, got it?
身体は温まったか？\n本番はこれからだぜ！:
All warmed up? Here
comes the real deal!
必殺チャージしたぜ！\nさあ 全力で行けよ！:
Specials charged! Time
to go all out!
時間切れだ お疲れさん\nさぁ 結果はどうだ？:
Time's up. Good work.
How'd you make out?
さーて 大魔王サマの\nお手並み拝見といこうか:
Let's have a look how
you do, shall we?
はじまりの地に来てから\n感じてたんだけどね……:
Since we arrived here,
I've been feeling...
ここは 創生のチカラが\nちょっと少ないみたい:
There isn't much
power of creation...
うーん この世界って\nいったいなんなんだろう:
Just what is this
world, anyway?
この地方は一段と\n創生のチカラが薄い……:
Even less power of
creation here...
何か理由があるのかな？:
Is there a reason for
this?
アマラークかあ……\nどんな国だろうね？:
I wonder what kind of
country Amarak is.
イルシームほどの強者が\n他にもいてほしいものだ:
I hope there are more
as strong as Ilseem.
ふふ……オーガの血が\n騒ぐってところかしら？:
Hehe, I guess it runs
in an Ogre's blood?
うう……フーラズーラが\n出ませんようにっ！:
Ugh, I hope we don't
see a Fluzula!
もし出たら オレが\n引きつける隙に 逃げろ:
If we see one, I'll
draw its attention.
ラキ……なぜ あなたは\nこんな場所に……？:
Lycae...why are you in
a place like this...?
ちっ この妙な鳴き声は\nあのフクロウか……？:
Is that the owl making
that strange sound?
ホー ホー ホゥ\nホゥ ホッホー ホー:
Hoo hoo ho
ho hoho hoo...
まれびとは どうして\n村を 眠らせたのかな。:
I wonder why they put
the village to sleep.
まれびとを 起こしたら\n理由が 聞けるかな？:
If we wake them up,
maybe they'll tell us?
どうだか。話ができる\n相手とは 限らねえぜ。:
I don't know. I guess
we'll find out.
ですが ひるんでは\nいられません:
But we can't afford
to hesitate.
結晶化してしまった皆を\n戻すためにも:
To return everyone
back to normal...
気を引きしめて\n塔へと 進みましょう:
Let's make our way
to the tower.
この島 どうやら雲で\nできているみたいですね:
It's an island made
of clouds...
孤島の修道院の地下から\n時見の泉に行けるわ:
The Timeseer Spring is
under that monastery.
私が５０００年の間\n眠っていた場所よ:
The place I slept
for 5000 years!
目覚めた時 あなたが\n迎えにきてくれて……:
When I woke up, you
were there for me...
約束を守ってくれたのが\n本当にうれしかった:
I was so happy you
kept your promise.
さあ もうすぐだよ\nこの先が 女神の神座だ:
Just up ahead is
the Goddess' Shrine.
神々以外の立ち入りは\n禁じられてるけど:
Only gods are allowed
entry, though.
きみだけは 特別だよ\n失礼のないようにね:
You're an exception.
Be respectful, okay?
母さまに呼ばれるなんて\nただ者じゃないのだわ:
The power of creation
is to the northwest.
足元に気をつけて進もう\n特に 底なし谷は……:
Watch your step around
this valley...
でもエルドナ。きみには\n来てほしくなかった:
But Eldona, I didn't
want you to come.
心配ご無用よ レクタ\n私 お役に立つのだわ！:
Don't worry, Lecta.
I can help!
創生のチカラは\n北の方角に集まってる:
The power of creation
is to the north.
きみと一緒なら\n大丈夫 信じているよ:
Everything'll be fine
with you beside me.
ペダルを踏んでから\n左へ糸を移動させて:
Push the pedal, then
thread to the left.
ここは神の器ヒューザが\n誘拐された遺跡ですよね:
So this is where Hyuza
was kidnapped...
あなたは音叉の仕掛けを\n易々と解いたんでした:
You easily solved
these tuning forks.
これほどの空間を\n創りあげるとは……:
How was such a place
created...?
悪神とは なんと\n強大な存在でしょうか:
What a mighty being,
this fiend...
たとえ 何があっても\nセーリアは 僕が守る！:
I'll protect you,
no matter what!
悪神の相手は 私たちに\nお任せください！:
Leave it to us to take
down that fiend!
柱を攻撃して\n炎を消すんだ:
Attack the pillars to
put out the flames!
ふふふ 少々厄介だね\nまかせてほしい:
Seems you're in some
trouble. Let me help.
ううっ……暗くて\nオバケが出そう……:
Eee... It's dark and
ghosts might appear...
この部屋……\n見覚えがありますね:
This room...it looks
familiar, doesn't it?
今 行われているのは\n貴人の葬儀でしょうか？:
Is this a funeral of
someone important?
あっ！ 見てください\n絵画が飾ってあります:
Oh, look! The
paintings on the wall!
お姉様 神剣を修復する\n装置は どちらに？:
Helvel, where can we
repair the sword?
中心核の間の奥だ\n資材倉庫にしまってある:
It's past here in
the back room.
いよいよ 塔の内部です\n危険も あるでしょうが:
I'm sure the tower
is dangerous inside.
何が起きても 絶対に\nあなたは 私が守ります:
I'll protect you, no
matter what happens.
ふかふかで なんとも\n不思議な 感触だねえ:
It's quite soft and
rather mysterious!
見てください ここにも\n女神像がありますよ:
Look, there's also a
Goddess statue here.
本当に 時間を\nさかのぼってるようだな:
It really feels like
going back in time.
まだ 準備ができてねえ\n時間を かせいでくれ！:
I'm not quite ready!
I need more time!
奴らに押し切られる前に\n神剣を振るいましょう！:
Use the divine sword!
We'll be overwhelmed!
ダメだ。一撃で壊すには\n神剣のチカラが足りねえ:
We can't! It doesn't
have enough power!
ここが踏ん張りどころだ\n頼むぜ 勇者と盟友！:
Stand firm! Countin'
on ya, Hero and ally!
回復は\nまかせてください。:
I'll take care of
your recovery.
ほかのみんなも 順調に\n進んでるはずだよね……:
I hope the others are
progressing smoothly.
心配無用だ。殺したって\n死なねえような連中だし:
No worries. Even dyin'
won't kill 'em!
兄者 言い方ってもんが\nあるだろ。まったく……:
Geez, there's ways to
say certain things...
敵の気配すらない……\nまるで遺跡か廃墟ですね:
It's deserted. There's
not a single enemy...
人ごみは 苦手なんでね\nありがたいというものさ:
I'm thankful. I'm not
so good in a crowd.
この中で お前が一番\n肝がすわっているようだ:
You seem to be the
most composed here.
この先は管制室ですね\n緊張してきました……:
The control room is
ahead. I'm nervous...
緊張？ 私は場違いにも\nおなかが空いてきました:
Nervous? My stomach is
starting to growl...
ニガユリ草を使った\nあの草餅が恋しい……:
I'm craving Bitter-
lily rice cake...
苦さの王様とも言われる\nあのニガユリ草ですか？:
Bitterlily Grass? The
king of bitterness?
なんと！ それは\nぜひ食べてみたいです！:
Wow! I really want
to eat one!
この戦いが終わったら\n皆で食べましょう……:
Once this is over, we
can all eat them...
ここまでは想定通り！\nまだ疲れちゃいないだろ:
So far so good! Not
tired yet, are ya?
みんなさん もう少しです\nがんばって！:
Just a little more!
You can do it!
住民のみんなの故障にも\n何か 関係あるのかな:
Is it related to the
residents' breakdowns?
クレーンを動かすなんて\nすごいね トラちゃん！:
Nice job with the
crane, Traeie!
ああ。さすがだな\n守護天使トラちゃん。:
As expected from the
Guardian Angel Traeie.
像のまわりはチカラを\n使わんでも安全じゃぞ！:
It is safe to stand
close to it!
ご主人様の気配に\n近づいておるぞっ！:
My master's presence
is quite close!
はいっ！ トープス！\n絶対 見つけるからね！:
Yes! Tohpes, I promise
I'll find you!
ヒヒヒ！ 最低最悪な\n悪夢に呑まれろぉ～！:
Hee hee! Swallowed by
your worst nightmares!
メネトの悪夢ってヤツは\nマジで 悪趣味だな。:
This nightmare thing
is really poor taste.
同感だよ。このテの輩に\n遠慮は 無用だね。:
Agreed. No need for us
to hold back.
なんか すっごいとこ\n来ちゃった！:
What an amazing
place this is!
きれいで ふしぎな場所\n空の上……なのかしら？:
A beautiful place in
the sky...I think?
ここから南側には\n魂の燭台はなかった:
Your candelabra wasn't
to the south of here.
この建物の先は\nまだ探していない:
I've yet to explore
beyond here.
ふっ……よほど私に活を\n入れたかったのでしょう:
You really wanted to
snap me out of it.
６０００年の昔から\n駆けつけたのですから:
You came all this way
from 6000 years ago...
その想いに報いるため\n絶対 負けられませんね:
To honor that, I
cannot lose here.
心域に 作り変えられて\nいるようですね……:
It seems the heartland
was remade...
創生のチカラが\n北西の方に集まってる:
The power of creation
lies to the northwest.
台座の光っている部分を\n調べてみてください:
Please check out the
pedestal's shiny spot.
地下におりる昇降機が\n起動するそうです:
The elevator is about
to go down.
大きな扉の両側に\n石碑のようなものが……:
Are those statues on
both sides...?
気になりますね……\n調べてみましょうか:
I'm curious... Let's
take a closer look.
うわあ。おっきくて\nリッパな神殿だね！:
Wow! What a huge and
impressive temple!
……かつてのナドラガの\n影響力の表れだろうな:
Must be from Nadraga's
past influence.
安心するのは 早いぞ\n村長に 話を聞かねば:
Let's talk to the
chief before assuming.
うわあ……。\nなに ここ。怖いよ……:
Ugh... This place
gives me the creeps...
毒素が かなり濃い。\n気を抜かずに 進もう:
The poison is quite
thick. Mind your way.
奥にあるのは 祭壇か？\n強い気配を 感じるぞ:
An altar? I feel a
strong presence.
そこに 何か あるの？\n調べてみようよ 隊長！:
Is there something
there? Let's go see!
先を急ぐぞ。あやつらに\nこの剣を好きにはさせん:
Come on. I won't let
them have their way!
今 我々が見たものは\nこの剣の記憶のようだ:
It seems to be the
sword's memories.
私が 母上より 剣を\n授かった日のものだな:
It was the day Mother
gave it to me.
兄姉たちから チカラを\n託されたときの記憶か:
That was when my
siblings helped me...
これにより 断罪の剣は\n究極の神器と化し……:
My sword became the
ultimate artifact...
ナドラガに 必殺の\n一撃を放つことができた:
I was able to strike
down Nadraga with it.
ナドラガとの決戦の\n記憶のようだな……:
That was the final
battle with Nadraga...
かくも長き別れは\n想像も していなかった:
It's been so long
without it.
だが 今こそ……。\nこの手に 取り戻さん！:
But now...I will
take it back!
新兵ども！ 大魔王様を\n倒す気でいけよ～！:
Recruits! Give it your
all to beat them!
さっすが 大魔王！\nまだまだいけるよな～？:
That's our Demon Lord!
Not done, are ya?
フ……見ているだけで\n血が たぎるようだ:
Hmph...seeing it just
makes my blood boil.
あ～っと……このへんで\nお開きにしませんかね？:
Uh...maybe we should
call it a day?
なんか ここ……\n空気が悪いね……:
The air here... Feels
kinda heavy...
うん……よくないモノが\nたくさんいるみたい:
Yeah...seems like lots
of bad things here.
こっ……\n怖い話しないでよ～！:
D-don't say scary
stuff like that!
さっきの扉\n壊れてたね……:
The door back there
was broken through...
執行者のしわざかも……\nふたりとも 気をつけて:
Maybe the enforcer...
Be careful, you guys.
悪趣味という言葉では\n到底 足りない場所だね:
Bad taste doesn't even
begin to describe it.
バルメシュケは ここで\nどんな魔道具を……？:
What is this magical
item Balmeschke has?
兄者 声がデカいッ！\nでも 気合い入ったろ？:
So loud! But you're
really pumped, huh?
僕らも一緒にいるよ！\n応援してるからね！:
We're with you, too!
You can do it!
背中は任せろ 友よ！:
I have your back,
my friend!
あなたが生きる\n世界を守る……！:
I will protect this
world you live in!
見せてやろうぜ 若者の\nチカラってやつをよ！:
Let's show 'em the
power of youth!
左と右に 糸を移動させ\n手前に打ってください:
Thread left and right,
then strum.
魔界で鳥系のモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 Bird monsters
in the Demon World.
万魔の塔のいずれかの災壇で １回生還 または制覇する。:
Clear or survive any platform
in Banma Tower.
バトエンの 大会 フリー対戦 なかま対戦のいずれかを\n１回プレイする。:
Play 1 Batoen Free Match or
Party Battle.
魔界で虫系のモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 Insect monsters
in the Demon World.
バルディア山岳地帯にいるモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 monsters in the Valdia
Mountain Region.
その日 自分がまだ水やりをしていない畑に\n３回水やりをする。:
In a single day, water a field you have
not yet watered 3 times.
大富豪の 段位戦 決定戦 なかま対戦のいずれかを\n１回プレイする。:
Play 1 Ranked, Playoffs, or Party Battle
Tycoon match.
魔界で水系のモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 Aquatic monsters
in the Demon World.
ガウシア樹海にいるモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 monsters in the Gaussia
Woodlands.
アストルティア防衛軍で １回防衛成功 または討伐する。:
Successfully defend or win once in
Astoltia Defense Force.
邪神の宮殿のいずれかの門を １回クリアする。:
Clear any one gate in Dark Deity's
Palace.
強戦士の書で いずれかの強ボスを ３回討伐する。:
Defeat any three Strong bosses in the
Book of Bosses.
魔界でスライム系のモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 Slime monsters
in the Demon World.
旧ネクロデア領にいるモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 monsters in the Old
Necrodea Area.
デスディオ暗黒荒原にいるモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 monsters in the Deathdio
Darklands.
破界篇の最後の敵を １匹討伐する。:
Defeat the final boss of the
Breaking World story once.
ベルヴァインの森西にいるモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 monsters in Belvain
Forest West.
魔界で物質系のモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 Material monsters
in the Demon World.
魔界で怪人系のモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 Humanoid monsters
in the Demon World.
魔界であくま系のモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 Demon monsters
in the Demon World.
魔界でドラゴン系のモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 Dragon monsters
in the Demon World.
魔界でゾンビ系のモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 Undead monsters
in the Demon World.
魔界で植物系のモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 Plant monsters
in the Demon World.
ジャリムバハ砂漠にいるモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 monsters in the
Jyarimbaha Desert.
魔幻都市ゴーラ跡にいるモンスターを ２０匹討伐する。:
Defeat 20 monsters in the
Ruins of Gora.
今年も 夏が終わってしまったのう……。\nお前さんたち みんなに いい夏の思い出:
Another summer has come to an end... I
hope you all have wonderful
summer memories. The Beach House is
closed for this year. Please come back
to Kyurarana Beach next year. I'm
looking forward to it.
フィッシングコンテストも いよいよ\n明日が 最終日となりました！\nまだ見せて:
Tomorrow is the last day of the fishing
contest! If you have any seasonal fish
that you haven't shown yet, please
don't forget to bring them to me!
Otherwise, they will not be registered
as a record! Good luck in your last
spurt!
フィッシングコンテストの ご参加\nありがとうございました！\n多くの方の 釣り:
Thank you very much for participating
in the Fishing Contest! I was very
moved to see so many people's fishing
spirit! If you were ranked in the
contest, you'll receive a wonderful
prize, so please come and see the
results!
全国の冒険者さん こんにちは！\nおいらの暮らす スウィ～ツランドのため\n冒険:
Hello adventurers! I'd like to ask you
to lend me an adventurer's hand to help
me in Sweetsland, where I live. I need
you to come to Glen, Julet, Azlan,
Gatara or Orphea!
冒険者さん 本当に ありがとうカボ。\nハロウィンを 盛りあげてくれたおかげで\:
Thank you so much, adventurers. Thanks
to the Halloween party, Papa was
revived and we were able to finish the
meeting of the Fairy King without any
problems. Halloween is the best!
Trick or Treat!
親愛なる 冒険者たちへ！\n今年も『白銀の星夜祭』が やってきた。\nお前さんた:
Dear adventurers! The Starry Night
Festival is here again this year and
you're all invited! I'm somewhere in
Glen, Julet, Gatara, Azlan and Orphea
wearing a red hat, so come speak to me!
I'll be waiting!
メリークリスマス！\n今年も楽しい いい祭りだったぜ。\nクリスマスといえば プ:
Merry Christmas! It's been another fun
festival again this year. Speaking of
Christmas, presents are a must. I've
prepared a special Starry Night
Festival present for you this year,
too! I sent it along with this letter,
so please accept it!
アストルティアの皆 年の瀬に\n突然のお手紙 失礼いたす。\nこたびは 皆を 新:
To everyone in Astoltia, I apologize
for the sudden letter at the end of the
year. I am writing to you to invite you
to a place to relax and welcome the New
Year. I look forward to seeing you at
South Port Lendor.
                                 Mutsuki
こたびは アストルティアの皆と 共に\n新年を迎え ことほぐことができたこと\n:
We at the Starlight Shrine would like
to express our sincere gratitude for
the opportunity to welcome the New Year
with everyone in Astoltia. We pray that
the new year will be a wonderful one.
                                 Mutsuki
アストルティアの皆さま。この時期だけの\n特別なイベントへの ご招待です。\n風:
Everyone in Astoltia. You are invited
to a special event just for this
season. I'm somewhere in Azlan, Orphea,
Glen, Julet and Gatara, so come find me
and Happy Valentine's Day!
皆さまのおかげで 無事に 第１０回\nアストルティア・クイーン コンテストの\n:
Thanks to all of you, the 10th Astoltia
Queen Contest went by without a hitch
and we are pleased to announce the
results, so please come and visit me.
You'll also receive a present from the
queen, so please look forward to it!
アストルティアの皆さんを この時期だけの特別なイベントに ご招待しちゃうよ～！\:
I'd like to invite all Astoltians to a
special event just for this season! I'm
somewhere in Azlan, Orphea, Glen, Julet
and Gatara, so come find me and Happy
White Day! Nice to meet you!!
おっ疲れちゃ～ん！ 無事に 第９回\nアストルティア・ナイト コンテストの\n結:
Great job everyone! The 9th Astoltia
Knight Contest went by without a hitch!
Please come and visit me to see the
results! Of course, you'll receive a
present from the winning Knight, so
please look forward to it! I'll be
waiting!
アストルティアのみんなに お願い！\n今 私たちが住む 妖精の国に\n大変なこと:
To everyone in Astoltia, please!
Something terrible has happened to our
Fairy Land and we're looking for
someone to listen to us. I'll be
waiting for you somewhere in Azlan,
Orphea, Glen, Julet and Gatara!
みんなのおかげで 今年も無事に\n春のお祭りを 終えることができたわ！\nタイフ:
Thanks to all of you, we had another
successful Spring Festival! The Typhoo
family seemed to enjoy the festival,
but next time I hope they come quietly.
Thank you so much!
アストルティアの みんなへ。\nぼくは オルクステラから来た スラクト。旅の扉が:
To everyone in Astoltia. I'm Majellan
from Orchesterra. I went to ooze a
teleportal but it went out of control
and I wound up in this world. Goo me a
favor and come meet me in South Port
Lendor!
アストルティアの みんなへ。\nぼくは オルクステラから来た スラクト。この世界:
To everyone in Astoltia. I'm Majellan
from Orchesterra. I'm having such
gooreat fun in this world, but it's
slime to go back to my own world now.
I hope you all come visit me in
Orchesterra someday! I'll be waiting!
アストルティアの皆さま。悠久のロマンス\n七夕の季節が やって来ました。\n七夕:
Everyone in Astoltia. The season of
eternal romance, the Star Fesival, has
come. The festival is being held at
Star Village to make a wish to the god
of marriage. Please come to, Azlan,
Orphea, Glen, Julet or Gatara.
皆さまのおかげで 無事に\nお祭りを 終えることができました。\nどうも ありが:
Thanks to all of you, we were able to
finish the festival successfully. Thank
you very much. I'd like to make one
final wish. May the god of marriage
bless you all...
今年もついに オレたちの季節……\nアツく ギラギラした夏がやってきた！\nだが:
It's finally our season...the sizzling
summer has arrived! But we're in a bit
of hot water. There's Arnai in the town
of Julet who can take you to Kyurarana
Beach, so why don't you talk to him?
                   Man of the Sea, Muron
１０周年 おめでとう。\nあなたと共に 過ごしてきた この年月は\n私にとって:
Congratulations on your 10th
anniversary. These years that I have
spent with you are a treasured memory
for me. I hope it is the same for you.
Let's continue to fight hand in hand
for the peace of Astoltia!
         To my dear ally, from your Hero
ガラじゃねえとは 思ったが\n祝いの言葉を 贈らせてもらうぜ。\n１０周年 おめ:
I know it's not a gala or anything, but
I'd like to offer my congratulations on
your 10th anniversary. I will continue
to move forward as I am. I know you
will too, right?
                                   Hyuza
１０周年おめでとうございます！\nどんな困難にも くじけず立ち向かう\nあなたの:
Congratulations on your 10th
anniversary! I have been encouraged
many times by the way you face any
difficulty. I am glad I was born in the
same hometown as you. I look forward to
working with you in the future!
            From Shini in Ethene Village
１０周年だよ！ １０周年！\nすっごーい！ 本当におめでとう！\nこれって 最高:
It's the 10th anniversary! 10th
anniversary! Amazing! Congratulations!
Isn't this the happiest thing ever? I
hope I can go on an adventure with you
again someday. Hehehe, leave the
healing to me!
                            From Seraphi
１０周年 誠に おめでとうございます。\nせんえつながら 竜族を代表して\nお祝:
Congratulations on your 10th
anniversary. On behalf of all
Nadravians, I would like to
congratulate you. I've also made 10
plushies by hand! I hope to show you
all of them together someday.
                       Priestess Estella
もう １０周年なのね！ あなたとの再会がもっと早ければ この感動を より深く\n:
It's already the 10th anniversary! It's
frustrating...that we couldn't have met
sooner to share this excitement more
deeply. I know you've had many
adventures in your life. I would love
to go on an adventure with you someday.
                            From Mereade
魔界から １０周年を祝おう。\nお前は あまたの苦難と冒険を経て\n多くのことを:
Happy 10th anniversary from the Demon
World. You've gone through many
hardships and adventures, and
accomplished a lot. But...you're not
satisfied yet, are you? Then come with
me. I'll take you beyond 10 years.
                                  Yushka
１０周年おめでとう！\nこの時を迎えられたのも あなたのおかげ。これからの１０年:
Happy 10th anniversary! It is thanks to
you that we have reached this moment. I
sincerely hope to see the same view
with you in the next 10 years and
beyond. I will always love you.
                             From Irusha
アストルティアが こうして平和なのも\nあなたの活躍が あってこそだと思います。:
I believe that Astoltia is at peace
because of your efforts. I've been
supporting you from the shadows, and am
filled with pride. Congratulations on
your 10th anniversary. Please let me
continue to support you.
                             From Yuliza
１０周年 おめでとう！ お兄ちゃん！\nこの すばらしい時を 一緒に迎えられて\:
Happy 10th anniversary, brother! I am
the happiest sister in the world to be
able to share this wonderful time with
you! Thank you so much for everything.
Let's have many adventures in the
future. I will always love you!
                      From <snplacehold>
わしは 記念大王スライム！\n『ドラゴンクエストウォーク』が\nもうすぐ ３周年:
I am the Commemorative King Slime and
I've come to Astoltia! It's slime to
celebrate the upcoming 3rd anniversary
of "Dragon Quest Walk". But I'm in a
slippery situation... Anyone ooze
willing to help, please come see me in
South Port Lendor.
わしじゃ 記念大王スライムじゃ！\n皆のおかげで わしも スラミチも\nアストル:
It's me, the Commemorative King Slime!
Thanks to all of you, Slimichi and I
had a gooreat trip to Astoltia! It's
sad, but we must be gooing home. If
you'd like to join us, everyone in
Astoltia is invited to the "Dragon
Quest Walk" 3rd Anniversary Celebration!
アストルティアの 冒険者さん！\nとある村で おそろしい事件が\n発生してるの！:
Adventurer from Astoltia! A terrible
incident has occurred in a certain
village! Please lend me your power!
I'll be waiting in Azlan, Orphea, Glen,
Julet and Gatara!
みんなのおかげで 無事に\n事件を 解決することができたよ！\nどうもありがとう:
Thanks to all of you, I was able to
successfully solve the case! Thank you
very much! I look forward to seeing you
again someday!
こんにちは！ 偶然 迷いこんだ\n星の大樹広場での 白銀の星夜祭\nとっても楽し:
Hi! I just wandered into the Starry
Tree Plaza by chance and had a very
enjoyable Starry Night Festival! The
present I sent with this letter is my
way of sharing the fun with you. Please
come stay at my inn sometime. I'll show
you the best hospitality!
<pnplacehold>さまが ふくびきで\n幸運を つかまれましたので\n幸:
Since <pnplacehold> has obtained good
fortune through the lottery, as a
sharing of luck, the Travel Concierge
has sent 3 Special Lottery Tickets.
アストルティアの皆さま。この時期だけの \n特別なイベントへの ご招待です。 \:
Dear Astoltians. You are invited to a
special event just for this season. I'm
somewhere in Azlan, Orphea, Glen, Julet
and Gatara, so come find me and Happy
Valentine's Day!
皆さまのおかげで 無事に 第１１回\nアストルティア・クイーン コンテストの\n:
Thanks to all of you, the 11th Astoltia
Queen Contest went by without a hitch
and we are pleased to announce the
results, so please come and visit me.
You'll also receive a present from the
queen, so please look forward to it!
おっ疲れちゃ～ん！ 無事に 第１０回\nアストルティア・ナイト コンテストの\n:
Great job everyone! The 10th Astoltia
Knight Contest went by without a hitch!
Please come and visit me to see the
results! Of course, you'll receive a
present from the winning Knight, so
please look forward to it! I'll be
waiting!
よお！ 俺は 冒険者のソウラ！\nいきなり手紙出して 驚かせちまったかな？実は今:
Hey! I'm Soura, an adventurer! I hope I
didn't scare you by sending this letter
out of the blue. I'm actually in Glen
Castle Town on my way to an adventure,
and I'd like to meet other adventurers.
If you have some free time, come visit
me! I have a little present for you!
アストルティアの皆さま。今 七夕の里では縁結びの神をお迎えして 願いを伝える\n:
Everyone in Astoltia. We are pleased to
announce a small festival at Star
Village to welcome the god of marriage
and to convey our wishes. A Yukata and
new furniture will be available. Please
come to Azlan, Orphea, Glen, Julet or
Gatara.
こんにちは！ 釣り師範ナツリです。\n熱く燃える 釣り魂を競う\nフィッシングコ:
Hello! I am Fish Master Natsuri! Please
come to South Port Lendor to join me
for a fishing contest to show off your
passionate fishing spirit! I have also
enclosed a rental outfit ticket for
clothes I have designed, so please try
them on!
毎日が エブリデイの若者たちよ！\n今年もついに オレたちの季節……\nアツく:
Every day is an everyday for the youth!
It's finally our season...the sizzling
summer has arrived! Arnai in Julet
will take you to Kyurarana Beach if you
need!
                   Man of the Sea, Muron
皆のおかげで 無事に 春のお祭りの\n準備も ととのい 妖精の国に\n春を 呼ぶ:
Thanks to all of you, we were able to
successfully prepare for the Spring
Festival and bring spring to Fairy
Land. We thank you. May those of you
who have found the Fairy Egg be blessed
with lots of luck. I look forward to
seeing you again someday.
アストルティアの冒険者 諸君にお願いだ。新しい 春のお祭りの準備のために \n風:
I have a favor to ask of you,
adventurers of Astoltia. In preparation
for the new Spring Festival, please
find me in Azlan, Orphea, Glen, Julet
and Gatara and speak to me. I'll tell
you more about it there.
おっ疲れちゃ～ん！ 無事に 第８回\nアストルティア・ナイト コンテストの\n結:
Great job everyone! The 8th Astoltia
Knight Contest went by without a hitch!
Please come and visit me to see the
results! Of course, you'll receive a
present from the winning Knight, so
please look forward to it! I'll be
waiting!
皆さまのおかげで 無事に 第９回\nアストルティア・クイーン コンテストの\n結:
Thanks to all of you, the 9th Astoltia
Queen Contest went by without a hitch
and we are pleased to announce the
results, so please come and visit me.
You'll also receive a present from the
queen, so please look forward to it!
アストルティアの皆さま。今年も\n特別なイベントに ご招待したいのですが\nちょ:
Dear Astoltians. I would like to invite
you to a very special event again this
year, but I have a bit of a problem.
Can you help me somewhere in Azlan,
Orphea, Glen Castle Town, Julet or
Gatara?
アストルティアの皆 お初にお目にかかる。突然のお手紙 失礼いたす。\nこたびは:
Hello to everyone in Astoltia, it's
nice to meet you. I apologize for the
sudden letter. I am writing to you to
invite you to a place to relax and
welcome the New Year. I look forward to
seeing you at South Port Lendor.
                                 Mutsuki
親愛なる冒険者たちよ メリークリスマス！残念ながら 今年の『白銀の星夜祭』は\n:
Dear adventurers, Merry Christmas! I
regret to inform you that this year's
Starry Night Festival will not be held.
I'm sending you a present along with
this letter, so I hope you won't mind!
I'm looking forward to seeing you all
at next year's Starry Night Festival!
突然の手紙で おどろいたかの。\nなに お前さんの未来が 見えたので \nひとつ:
You may be surprised at my sudden
letter. Since I have seen your future,
I would like to show you one path you
should take. Recently a couple has movedto Gran Zedora Kingdom. By helping them,you will be guided to your destiny. You
are free to believe it or not...
アストルティアの 冒険者たちへ。\nわが王国……そして そちらの世界に\n大いな:
To the adventurers of Astoltia. My
kingdom...and your world are in great
danger. I would like you to hear from
one of my subordinates somewhere in
Glen, Julet, Azlan, Gatara or Orphea.
アストルティアの皆さま。今 七夕の里では縁結びの神をお迎えして 願いを伝える\n:
Everyone in Astoltia. We are pleased to
announce a small festival at Star
Village to welcome the god of marriage
and to convey our wishes. Please come
to Azlan, Orphea, Glen, Julet or Gatara.
みんなのおかげで 無事に タマゴロンを\nポワン様に 届けることができたわ。\n:
Thanks to all of you, we were able to
safely deliver the Bad Egg to Treacle.
The spring celebration in Fairy Land
was so much fun! Thank you so much!
アストルティアのみんなに お願い！\n私たち 困ったことになっちゃって\n話を聞:
To everyone in Astoltia, please! We're
in trouble and we're looking for
someone to help us. You'll find us in
South Port Lendor! We'll be waiting!
おっ疲れちゃ～ん！ 無事に 第７回\nアストルティア・ナイト コンテストの\n結:
Great job everyone! The 7th Astoltia
Knight Contest went by without a hitch!
Please come and visit me to see the
results! Of course, you'll receive a
present from the winning Knight, so
please look forward to it! I'll be
waiting!
皆さまのおかげで 無事に 第８回\nアストルティア・クイーン総選挙の\n結果発表:
Thanks to all of you, the 8th Astoltia
Queen Election went by without a hitch
and we are pleased to announce the
results, so please come and visit me.
You'll also receive a present from the
queen, so please look forward to it!
今回のイベントに ご参加いただきまして\nまことに ありがとうございました！\n:
Thank you very much for participating
in this event! How was it? Did you
enjoy it? I hope you enjoyed it! I wish
you all a wonderful year! Well then,
have a good day!
アストルティアの皆様 ごきげんよう！\n毎度おなじみ ふくびきマンでございます。:
Hello everyone in Astoltia! I'm the
Lottery Man, as always. I would like to
invite you to a special event only for
this season! Please come and visit me
in South Port Lendor. We look forward
to seeing you soon!
わたくしは『デスマスター』の デズリン。このたび 新たに 弟子をとろうと思い至り:
I am Deathlin, the "Death Master".
I have decided to take on a new
disciple and have called on you because
you have the right talents. Please come
to my home inside the well southeast of
Glen East with a vocation of level 50 ormore. I will let your talents blossom!
『速報☆イケメン盗賊 ガタラに現る！』\n:
Breaking news☆Handsome thief in Gatara!
Lilina here from Astoltia News!
A handsome thief from Erdrea has arrivedin Mount Gatara! His tousled blue hair
is very charming! If you are interested,go see him as soon as possible!
アストルティアのみんなへ。\nおいらは ブルリア星から来た モガマル。でも もう:
To everyone in Astoltia. I'm Cyril from
the planet Brullia. I have to go home
now, but I had a lot of fun and saw
many things for the first time! I hope
everyone can come to planet Brullia
next time!
アストルティアのみんなへ。\nおいらは ブルリア星から来た モガマル。ひょんなこ:
To everyone in Astoltia. I'm Cyril from
the planet Brullia. It seems I
accidentally ended up in this world by
some twist of fate. I'm in South Port
Lendor, so please come and see me!
全国の旅人さん おつかれさま！\nついに 知の祝祭が 終わっちゃったよ。\nまた:
Well done, travelers from all over! At
long last, the Wisdom Festival has come
to an end. Please wait for Fort Wisdom
to appear in the world again someday.
Well then, goodbye!
                          Servant Kilulu
全国の旅人さん こんにちは！\n旅人さんの みがきぬかれた知識を\n見込んで こ:
Hello to travelers from all over! In
anticipation of your skilled knowledge,
I'd like to invite you to a special
limited time event! I'll be waiting for
you in Lion Gate, Treeshade Village,
Pipi's Inn, Mogare Camp and Prayer Inn.
                          Servant Kilulu
ただいま モンスター酒場組合では\n隠れスライムフェスティバル 開催中です！参加:
The Monster Tavern Association is
currently holding a hidden Slime
Festival! If you would like to
participate, please contact the event
staff at the tavern in Azlan, Glen,
Gatara, Julet or Orphea. We look
forward to your participation!
黄金の秘宝を 求めし者どもよ。\n我と 刹那の余興を楽しもうぞ。\nピラミッドの:
O seekers of the golden treasure. Enjoy
a moment's entertainment with me. I
have hidden my treasures beyond the
riddles of the pyramid. We await you at
the pyramid, where the mummy girl
resides, north of Defel Desert.
皆さまに ご好評いただきました\nアストルティアカップは 本日をもちまして終了し:
The Astoltia Cup, which was so well
received by everyone, has come to an
end today. We are handing out a prize
to all participants, so please pick it
up from Tarta, the receptionist in the
Slime Race Hall on the floor to the
right of the entrance.
おっ疲れちゃ～ん！ 無事に 第６回\nアストルティア・ナイト コンテストの結果発:
Great job everyone! The 6th Astoltia
Knight Contest went by without a hitch!
Please come and visit me to see the
results! Of course, you'll receive a
present from the winning Knight, so
please look forward to it! I'll be
waiting!
本日より スライムレースの祭典\nアストルティアカップが 開催されます。\nルー:
Starting today, the grand event of
Slime Racing, the Astoltia Cup, is
being held. The rules have been
substantially updated. To enter, see
Tarta, the receptionist in the Slime
Race Hall at the Casino. We look forwardto seeing you on Luckland Island.
皆さまのおかげで 無事に 第７回 \nアストルティア・クイーン総選挙の \n結果:
Thanks to all of you, the 7th Astoltia
Queen Election went by without a hitch
and we are pleased to announce the
results, so please come and visit me.
You'll also receive a present from the
queen, so please look forward to it!
屈強なる 冒険者たちへ！\n凍える季節 お前さんたちを 妖精の祭典\n『白銀の星:
To all mighty adventurers! I invite you
to the "Starry Night Festival", a fairy
festival in the freezing season. I'm
somewhere in Glen, Julet, Azlan,
Gatara, and Orphea wearing a red hat,
so come and speak to me!
バトルトリニティを 知っておるかの？ \n１チーム５人……３勢力に分かれて \n:
Are you familiar with Battle Trinity?
It's a casual game in which teams of 5
players are divided into 3 groups and
compete for points. If you are
interested, talk to an Agent in Glen,
Julet, Gatara, Azlan, or Orphea. I'll
be waiting. Heheheh.
熱きバトエンファイターたちに告ぐ！\nオレの名前は バトエンジャー！\n蒼きバト:
Attention passionate Batoen fighters!
My name is Batoenger! Driven by the
aura of the Blue Batoen, I've descended
to organize a Batoen Tournament. Gather
at the Legends Headquarters in North
Port Lendor to enter this exciting
Batoen Tournament! I'll be waiting!
みんな スウィ～ツランドに\n遊びにきてくれて ありがとうカボ！\nハロウィンは:
Thank you all for coming to Sweetsland!
Did you have a good time on Halloween?
I'm looking forward to seeing you all
in Astoltia again!
Trick or Treat!!
アストルティアのみんな ハロウィンの\n季節が やってきたカボ！\nおいらの故郷:
Halloween season has come to everyone
in Astoltia! I hope you will come visit
my hometown. I have a present for you.
I'll be waiting for you somewhere in
Azlan, Orphea, Glen, Julet and Gatara!
こんにちは！ 釣り師範ナツリです。\nこのたび 熱く燃える 釣り魂を競う\nフィ:
Hello, I am Fish Master Natsuri! We are
pleased to inform all adventurers that
we will be holding a fishing contest to
show off your passionate fishing
spirit! Please come to south Lendor for
more details!
～遊び心の持ち主 求む！～\nオレっちのサークル 遊びクラブに入会して『遊び人』:
～Seeking those with a playful spirit!～My circle, the Play Club, is looking
for those who want to be a "Gadabout"!
Talk to Weav at the Cat Island pier on
Muse Coast and visit our island! Please
come with a vocation level 50 or above!
            Play Club President, Lucchie
よう。オレは船乗りの バルバトス。\nこの１年間 待ち望んできた時が\nついに:
Hey there, I'm Balbatos, a sailor. I've
been waiting for this moment for the
past year and now the time has finally
come! I am now recruiting a crew to
join me on a voyage to the Phantom Sea
Trashka! I'll be waiting for you
reckless idiots in Julet!
私の名前は ルイーダ。\n酒場の主人をしているのだけど\nすごウデの冒険者として:
My name is Luida. I am the owner of a
tavern and I have a very special favor
to ask of you, a renowned adventurer.
In South Port Lendor, there is a Slime
that I know named Agoola, so try
listening to what he has to say. I'm
counting on you!
イベントは 楽しんでもらえたかしら？\nあなたたちの狩猟本能 しっかりと\n見届:
Did you enjoy the event? I have been
able to observe your hunting instincts.
You can exchange your Jailrun Points
for wonderful prizes until August 30
(Thursday). Don't forget to exchange
them.
退屈な毎日を 過ごしている そこの\n冒険者さん。あなたの 狩猟本能をくすぐると:
Adventurers out there who spend their
days in boredom. I've prepared a specialevent that will tickle your hunting
instincts. I can't believe the things
you will experience in this event... Ah,just thinking about it makes me tingle
with excitement...! Come to Azlan now!
皆さまのおかげで 無事に\n七夕祭りを 終えることができました。\nどうも あり:
Thanks to all of you, we were able to
finish the Star Festival successfully.
Thank you very much. I'd like to make
one final wish. May the god of marriage
bless you all...
アストルティアの皆さま。今 七夕の里では縁結びの神をお迎えして 願いを伝える\n:
Everyone in Astoltia. We are pleased to
announce a small festival at Star
Village to welcome the god of marriage
and to convey our wishes. We also have
new furniture available. Please come to
Azlan, Orphea, Glen, Julet, or Gatara.
このたびは わ…私の主のことで 皆さまに手紙をお配りし ご心配をおかけしました。:
I am sorry for the concern I have
caused you by distributing this letter
regarding my Master. My Master has
regained his pride and is now on a
journey around the world, declaring
that he will get what he truly wants.
I hope to see you again someday...
心優しい 冒険者の皆さまへ。\n結婚式をひかえた 妹のミナヅキのために\nあるも:
To all kind-hearted adventurers. My
sister Minazuki is about to get married
so could you help me get a certain item
for her. The wedding is almost here and
I haven't been able to obtain it yet.
I'll be waiting on the beach in Julet
Town, so please lend me your help!
みんなのおかげで 今年も無事\n妖精の国に 春を呼ぶことができたわ！\nサタデー:
Thanks to all of you, we were able to
bring spring to Fairy Land again this
year! The Saturday Dancers were so
happy to have performed their best and
left for a new stage. Thank you so
much!
おっ疲れちゃ～ん！ 無事に 第５回 \nアストルティア・ナイト コンテストの \:
Great job everyone! The 5th Astoltia
Knight Contest went by without a hitch!
Please come and visit me to see the
results! Of course, you'll receive a
present from the winning Knight, so
please look forward to it! I'll be
waiting!
アストルティアの皆さんを この時期だけの特別なイベントに ご招待しちゃうよ～！:
I'd like to invite all Astoltians to a
special event just for this season! I'm
somewhere in Azlan, Orphea, Glen, Julet
and Gatara, so come find me and Happy
White Day! Nice to meet you!!
皆さまのおかげで 無事に 第６回 \nアストルティア・クイーン総選挙の \n結果:
Thanks to all of you, the 6th Astoltia
Queen Election went by without a hitch
and we are pleased to announce the
results, so please come and visit me.
You'll also receive a present from the
queen, so please look forward to it!
本日より スライムレースの祭典\nアストルティアカップが 期間限定で\n開催され:
Starting today, the grand event of
Slime Racing, the Astoltia Cup, is
being held for a limited time. Please
come and visit us at the Casino on
Luckland Island. The Slime Race Hall is
located on the floor to the right of
the entrance.
やっほー！ 妖精の女王だよー！\n今年は アストルティアに 招待してくれてありが:
Hey there! It's the Fairy Queen!
Thanks for inviting me to Astoltia this
year.♪ It was so much fun! I sent you
a Starry Night Festival present along
with this letter, so please accept it!
Well then, I'll see you again.
Bye bye.♪
メリークリスマス！\n今年の 特別な 白銀の星夜祭では\nなつかしいヤローにも:
Merry Christmas! I had a great time at
this year's special Starry Night
Festival, and it was great to see some
old friends! It's all thanks to you! On
behalf of Fairy Queen, I'd like to
thank you. Thanks a lot! See you next
year!
全国の 心優しい旅人さん こんにちは！\n大ピンチの私を 助けてくれませんか。\:
Hello kind-hearted travelers from all
over! I'm in a big pinch and I need
your help. I'm somewhere in Glen,
Julet, Gatara, Azlan and Orphea, so
please find me and say the word!
アストルティアの冒険者諸君。\nこのエレガンスな手紙を 見た者は\n娯楽島ラッカ:
Adventurers of Astoltia. If you see
this elegant letter, please go straight
to the Casino on Luckland Island.
We are giving you special permission to
participate in this glamorous event!
                         Chairman Gemsly
トートです。かばん作りは順調で\n仕事の依頼も 来るようになりました。\n<pn:
I'm Tote. The bag making is going well,
and I'm receiving a lot of job
requests. I heard that your vocation
level is now 70 or above. I'd like to
talk to you about something, so could
you come to the bag workshop located in
the well in Julet?
このお手紙が 見えている人に\n大事なお知らせッチ！\nオイラ そろそろ ヨッチ:
I have an important announcement for
those who can see this letter! I'm
returning to Tickington very soon, and
time's a-ticking. If you still have
business with me, hurry and tick talk
to me in Azlan! I'll be waiting!
みんな スウィ～ツランドに\n遊びにきてくれて ありがとうカボ！\nハロウィンの:
Thank you all for coming to Sweetsland!
Did you have fun at the Halloween
event? I was able to witness everyone's
intense battles perfectly! Thanks for
your hard work, everyone!
アストルティアのみんなに\nハロウィンの ご案内だカボ～！\n風の町アズラン オ:
Here's a little Halloween reminder to
everyone in Astoltia! I'm somewhere in
Azlan, Orphea, Glen, Julet, and Gatara,
so please come and say "Trick or Treat"!I'll be waiting for you!
はじめまして。私の名前は ルイーダ。\nとある場所で 酒場を経営しているのだけど:
Nice to meet you. My name is Luida.
I own a tavern in a certain place, and
I have a very special favor to ask of
you, a renowned adventurer. In South
Port Lendor, there is a Slime that I
know named Agoola, so try listening to
what he has to say. I'm counting on you!
このお手紙が 見えている人に\n大事な お知らせッチ！\nもしよかったら オイラ:
I have an important announcement for
those of you who can see this letter!
If you have the time, I would like you
to help me with my work! I'd like to
tick talk to you directly about the
details! I'll be waiting for you round
the clock at a place called Azlan!
毎日が エブリデイの若者たちよ！\n今年もついに オレたちの季節……\nアツく:
Everyday is everyday, young people!
It's finally our season, the SizzSizz
summer! Talk to Arnai, our guide in
Julet, and come on down to
Kyurarana Beach. I'll be waiting for
you!Muron, the man of the sea
ハ～イ！ みんな～ 元気～？\nロトゼタシアで 人気沸騰中の旅芸人が\nアストル:
Hey darling, how are you? The popular
minstrel from Erdrea gracefully lands
in Astoltia.♪ I'll be waiting for you
in a cute little town called Orphea, so
come give me a visit, honey.♪ Let's
have a party to celebrate!♪
            Minstrel of Erdrea, Sylvando
オレは 船乗りのバルバトス。\n偶然にも 幻の海トラシュカと呼ばれる\n未知の海:
I'm Balbatos, a sailor. By chance, I
happen to have discovered a passage to
uncharted waters called the Phantom Sea
Trashka, and I am now recruiting a crew
to join me on this voyage! No
experience necessary! I am waiting for
someone with a reckless spirit in Julet!
このたび アストルティア五大陸をめぐる\nアストルティアラリーの 開催が決定！\:
The Astoltia Rally will be held on the
five continents of Astoltia! This event
is for adventurers who have traveled
all over Astoltia. Please, show us your
running skills! We'll be waiting at
Mogare Camp, Treeshade Village and
Pipi's Inn.
心優しい 冒険者さんたちのおかげで\n困ったちゃんな アマリリスさんも\n満足そ:
Thanks to the kind-hearted adventurers,
the troubled Amaryllis returned to her
hometown with a satisfied look on her
face. I was finally released from
helping her, but I'm sure I'll be asked
to help her again someday. I'd be happy
if you could come see me then.
みんな 妖精の国に 遊びにきてくれて\nありがとう！\nどう？ 春を 感じてもら:
Thank you all for coming to Fairy Land!
What do you think? Did you feel the
spring? I'm looking forward to seeing
you all in Astoltia again!
アストルティアの みんなに お誘いよ。\n今 妖精の国は 桜が満開なの。私が\n:
An invitation to all of you in
Astoltia. The cherry blossoms are in
full bloom in Fairy Land right now.
I'll take you there, so come visit us!
I have new furniture and special
presents for you. I'll be waiting for
you somewhere in Wind Town Azlan Town of
Orphea Glen Castle Town Julet
Mount Gatara!
おっ疲れちゃ～ん！ 無事に 第４回\nアストルティア・ナイト総選挙の\n結果発表:
Great job everyone! The 4th Astoltia
Knight Election went by without a
hitch! Please come and visit me to see
the results! Of course, you'll receive
a present from the winning Knight, so
please look forward to it! I'll be
waiting!
アストルティアの皆さん！ 今年も\n特別なイベントに ご招待したいんだけど\nち:
Dear Astoltia, I'd like to invite you
to a very special Bento again this
year, but things got a little out of
hand! I'd like to invite you to a
special Bento again this year, but I'm
in a bit of trouble! I'm somewhere in
Wind Town Azlan Town of Orphea Glen
Castle Town Julet Mount Gatara and
I need your help! Please~!
皆さまのおかげで 無事に 第５回\nアストルティア・クイーン総選挙の\n結果発表:
Thanks to all of you, the 5th Astoltia
Queen Election went by without a hitch
and we are pleased to announce the
results, so please come and visit me.
You'll also receive a present from the
queen, so please look forward to it!
フィッシングコンテストも いよいよ\n明日が 最終日となりました！\nまだ見せて:
Tomorrow is the last day of the fishing
contest! If you have any seasonal fish
that you haven't shown yet, please
don't forget to bring them to me!
Otherwise, they will not be registered
as a record! Good luck in your last
spurt!
はじめまして！ 私は釣り師範ナツリです。このたび 熱く燃える 釣り魂を競う\nフ:
Nice to meet you! My name is Fish
Master Natsuri. I am contacting all
adventurers to let you know that we are
going to hold a fishing contest for
your passionate fishing spirit! Please
come to the south of Port Lendor
for more details!
全国の旅人さん こんにちは！\n心優しい みなさん 助けてください！\nグレン城:
Hello, travelers from all over the
country! Hello, kind-hearted people,
please help me! Please find me
somewhere in Glen Castle Town, Julet
Town, Mount GataraWind Town, Azlan Town
of Orphea and say the word!
はじめまして！ 俺はソウラ。\nみんなと同じ冒険者だ。\nじつは ある冒険者仲間:
Nice to meet you! My name is Soura, and
I'm an adventurer like everyone else.
I'm an adventurer like everyone else,
and I'm looking for some help from an
adventurer companion who's having a
hard time with his own trials! He's
looking for a painting called "Fantasy
Painting". You'll find out when you get
there!
旅人さんたちが がんばってくれたおかげでスウィ～ツランドに 平和が戻ったカボ。\:
Thanks to the efforts of the travelers,
peace has returned to Sweetsland. Thank
you so much Cabo! From now on, the
sweet and the spicy will work hand in
hand to make Sweetsland a better
country. Trick or Treat!
全国の旅人さん こんにちは！\n突然のお手紙 ごめんなさいカボ。\nじつは 旅人:
Hello, National Traveler! I'm sorry for
the sudden letter. I have a favor to
ask of you, my fellow travelers. I want
you to come to Glen Castle Town Julet
Town Wind Town Azlan Mount Gatara Town
of Orphea!
心優しい 冒険者さんたちのおかげで\n困ったちゃんな あの子も 満足そうに\n故:
Thanks to the kind-hearted adventurers,
the troubled girl returned to her
hometown with a satisfied look on her
face. I've finally been released from
helping her, but I'm sure I'll be asked
to help her again sometime soon. I'd be
happy if you could come see me then.
ボクは 困ったちゃんな女の子に\n協力させられてる 善良なスライムなんだ。どなた:
I'm just a good Slime who is forced to
cooperate with a girl in trouble. If
you are a kind-hearted adventurer,
please come and meet her. You can meet
her somewhere in Wind Town Azlan Town
of Orphea Glen Castle Town Julet
Mount Gatara.
毎日が エブリデイの若者たちよ！\n今年もついに オレたちの季節……\nアツく:
Everyday is everyday, young people!
It's finally our season, the SizzSizz
summer, and we've got a guide to get
you from Julet to Kyurarana Beach
in no time! This year, we have a guide
to get you from Julet to Kyurarana
Beach in no time. We'll be waiting for
you!Muron, the man of the sea
『占い師』のお仕事 始めませんか？\nこのたび オルフェアの町の裏通りに\n占い:
Would you like to start working as a
"fortune teller"? We have just opened
Divine House in the alleyway of Town of
Orphea. We are looking for an
apprentice fortune teller who can
kindly tell the problems of our
clients. Let's work together! No
experience necessary. Fortune Teller
Juno
全国の旅人さん ごきげんよう！\n「知の祝祭への招待券」を\nまた配ることになっ:
Greetings to travelers from all over
the country! We're excited to announce
that we'll be giving away another
Wisdom Festival Invite! Please come to
Lion Gate Treeshade Village Pipi's Inn
Mogare Camp Prayer Inn with your
invitation! We'll be waiting for you!
Servant Kilulu
あ…あの 突然のお手紙 失礼いたします。わっ 私は とある高貴な勝ち組の方の\n:
Oh, excuse my sudden letter. My name is
Mitsuno, servant of a certain noble and
victorious man. I have taken the
liberty of writing to you, the renowned
adventurer, to discuss the matter of my
master's depression. Please come and
see me on the beach of Julet.
アストルティアの皆様 ごきげんよう。\nこのたび ふくびきランドの運命が\n決定:
Dear Astoltia, Cheery here. The fate of
Lotteryland has now been decided. The
result of the fate will be announced by
the Princess herself, so please come
and meet her at the Church in North
Port Lendor with yourselves!
アストルティアの皆様 ごきげんよう。\nワタクシ ふくびきランド王家に\n仕えて:
Dear Astoltia, Cheery to you all. My
name is Ruffle and I serve the royal
family of Lottery Land. Today, I have
come to the Church of North Port Lendor
with the Princess to ask for your help.
I hope you kind-hearted adventurers
will help me!
私 ポワン様に ほめられちゃったっ！\nこの幸せ気分を みんなにも\nおすそわけ:
I've been praised by Treacle! I want to
share this feeling of happiness with
you all, so I'm going to give you a
voucher. You can exchange it for a gift
if you come and see me! I will return
to Fairy Land after version 3.3, so
please be careful about the time frame.
みんなのおかげで 妖精の国に\nたくさんの お花を 咲かせることが\nできたわ。:
Thanks to all of you, we were able to
bloom many flowers in Fairy Land. Thank
you so much! If you come see me before
April 5th, we can exchange Fea seeds!
アストルティアの みんなに\nお願いがあるの。聞いてくれない？\n風の町アズラン:
I have a favor to ask of everyone in
Astoltia. Will you listen to me? I'll
be waiting for you somewhere in Wind
Town Azlan Town of Orphea Glen Castle
Town Julet Mount Gatara!
こんにちは パウダーです！\nイベントを開くのは 初めてだったけど\nみなさんと:
Hello, my name is Powder! It was my
first time to organize a Bento, but I
had a great time touring the sights
with you all and I hope to see you
again somewhere in Astoltia! I hope to
see you again somewhere in
Astoltia!Powder!
みなさん はじめまして！\nプクリポのパウダーといいます。\n突然なのですが フ:
Hi everyone, nice to meet you! My name
is Powder from Pukulipo. I'm Pukulipo
Powder, and I'm hosting a play yay
Bento with my friend Goro in Astoltia
to explore the beautiful sights of
Astoltia. Please check out the
Awakening Adventurer's Square to find
out how you can participate and come
and have fun! Powder
おっ疲れちゃ～ん！ 無事に 第３回\nアストルティア・ナイト総選挙の\n結果発表:
Great job everyone! The 3rd Astoltia
Knight Election went by without a
hitch! Please come and visit me to see
the results! Of course, you'll receive
a present from the winning Knight, so
please look forward to it! I'll be
waiting!
皆さまのおかげで 無事に 第４回\nアストルティア・クイーン総選挙の\n結果発表:
Thanks to all of you, the 4th Astoltia
Queen Election went by without a hitch
and we are pleased to announce the
results, so please come and visit me.
You'll also receive a present from the
queen, so please look forward to it!
全国の旅人さん ごきげんよう！\n旅人さんの みがきぬかれた知識を\n見込んで:
Greetings to travelers from all over
the country! We'd like to invite you to
a special Ten Day Bento, based on your
well-honed knowledge of the world of
travel! I'll be waiting for you at Lion
Gate Treeshade Village Pipi's Inn
Mogare Camp Prayer Inn. Servant Kilulu
アストルティアのみんなに ハロウィンの\n特別なイベントの ご案内だカボ～！\n:
Here's a special Halloween Bento for
everyone in Astoltia! Wind Town Azlan
Town of Orphea Glen Castle Town Julet
Town Mount Gatara I'll be somewhere in
the town and I want you to call out
"Trick or Treat! I'll be waiting for
you!
アストルティアの 冒険者たちへ。\nわが王国……そして そちらの世界に\n大いな:
To the adventurers of Astoltia. My
kingdom...and your world are in great
danger. I would like you to hear from
one of my subordinates somewhere in
Glen, Julet, Azlan, Gatara or Orphea.
わしは 採掘ギルドのマスター・ホッチャ。というても ギルドは現在休業中じゃがな。:
I am Guildmaster Hotcha of the Mining
Guild, although the guild is currently
closed. I am sending this letter to all
adventurers to ask for a job, but not
just anyone will do, so I will be
screening them. I'll be waiting for you
at the Mining Guild in the upper levels
of Mount Gatara.
全国の旅人さん ごきげんよう！\nまたまた「知の祝祭への招待券」を\n配ることに:
Greetings to all travelers! I'm
excited to announce that we will be
giving away another Wisdom Festival
Invite! Please come to Lion Gate
Treeshade Village Pipi's Inn Mogare
Camp Prayer Inn with your invitation!
We'll be waiting for you! Servant
Kilulu
はじめまして。\nボクは 妖精図書館という場所で\n管理人をしている ミモリーと:
Nice to meet you. My name is Mimori,
and I am the administrator of a place
called Fairy Library. Among the many
books, I have found you, a rare talent.
Please come to Fairy Library from the
well on the western edge of City of
Megistris.
紅玉館では お世話になりました。\n薬のおかげで体調もよくなり 家人とともに穏や:
Thank you very much for your help at themansion. Thanks to the medicine,
I am feeling better and am enjoying a
peaceful life with my family. I've left
a small gift for you at the Travel
Concierge. I hope you like it. I will
never forget your kindness.
よう みんな！ 今 話題の新職業\n『踊り子』に興味はねぇか？ あるよなっ！じつ:
Hey everyone! Are you interested in the
hot new location "dancer"? I'm sure you
are! Actually, in response to
everyone's voice, I've set up a dancer
base of operations at Lion Gate in
Ogreed Continent. We are looking for
companions to help us build a legend
with us!Nachos, dancer producer
おかげさまで 無事に 第２回\nアストルティア・ナイト コンテストの\n結果発表:
Great job everyone! The 2nd Astoltia
Knight Contest went by without a hitch!
Please come and visit me to see the
results! Of course, you'll receive a
present from the winning Knight, so
please look forward to it! I'll be
waiting!
アストルティアの皆さんを この時期だけの特別なイベントに ご招待します！\n風の:
We invite you to join us in Astoltia
for a very special Bento just for this
time of year! Wind Town Azlan Town of
Orphea Glen Castle Town Julet
Mount Gatara, look for me somewhere in
Mount Gatara and say Happi - White Day!
I'll be waiting for you! I'll be
waiting for you!
皆さまのおかげで 無事に 第３回\nアストルティア・クイーン総選挙の\n結果発表:
Thanks to all of you, the 3rd Astoltia
Queen Election went by without a hitch
and we are pleased to announce the
results, so please come and visit me.
You'll also receive a present from the
queen, so please look forward to it!
ワガハイの名は 騎士レモンハルト。\n『気高き戦いは 知識の上に成り立つ』\nこ:
My name is Lemonheart the Knight, and
"noble warfare is based on knowledge"
is a family motto that has been passed
down in my family for generations. If
you are a top-notch adventurer, I would
like to challenge you to a quiz battle
of my own devising. We await the
challenger in the north of Port Town
Lendor!
こんにちは まもの使いのカレヴァンです。長らく閉鎖されていた モンスター格闘場を:
Hello, it's Kalevan, the Monster Master.We're finally able to reopen the MonsterArena after being closed for so long.
If you bring three or more fellow
monsters that you want to test their
skills with, come to the Monster Battle
Road at the Monster Arena in Al-Ahagiro!
突然の お手紙 失礼いたします！\n<pnplacehold>どのの おチカラを:
I apologize for the suddenness of this
letter! I have a favor to ask of you,
<pnplacehold>, and I will be waiting
for you at the Monster Strike Force
Headquarters in the tavern in South
Port Lendor.
     Otto, Monster Strike Force Recorder
屈強なる 冒険者たちへ！ \n凍える季節 お前さんたちを 妖精の祭典 \n『白銀:
To all mighty adventurers! I invite you
to the "Starry Night Festival", a fairy
festival in the freezing season. I'm
somewhere in Glen, Julet, Azlan,
Gatara, and Orphea wearing a red hat,
so come and speak to me!
皆さま～ まとめ屋タバネちゃんですよ～。独自の まとめアイテムを開発していたら\:
Hi, everyone! This is Tabane, Summary
Shop Owner! I've been creating my own
summary items and they are just amazing!I'll be giving them away free of charge,so come see me on the second floor of
Chief Golek's house in Luckland!
オルフェアの町近くにある森を お散歩中に迷子になったクポ。でも 気づいたら\nモ:
Kupo got lost while taking a walk in
the forest near the Town of Orphea. But
when he found himself back in Mog's
world, he didn't know what happened,
but thanks to everyone's help, he was
able to bring home lots of flowers!
Thanks to all of you, I was able to
bring home lots of flowers! Thank you!
こんにちわっ！ 夢見るお花の配達人\nプロルです♪ 今 オルフェアの町に\n遊び:
Hello, I'm master Pulolu of Dreaming
Flowers! I'm master Pulolu, the dreamy
flower distributor.  I'm visiting the
Town of Orphea right now, and there's
something in front of the fountain in
the plaza. It seems that the people of
the town can't see it. Is this
Obaburuburu? Pulolu, I'm really curious
about it, so I'd like you to talk to
it.
こんにちはクポ！ 黒衣森でお散歩してたらいつのまにか モグの知らない世界に\n迷:
Hello, Kupo! I was strolling in the
Black Forest, and before I knew it, I
wandered into a world that Mogu doesn't
know. I want to make friends with
everyone in this world. Mog is in a
town called Orphea! I'll be waiting for
you.
気づけばもう 夏も終わり……。\nあなたたちと過ごした この夏の日々は\n貴重な:
Summer has already come to an end. The
days I spent with you this summer have
become precious memories for me. I look
forward to seeing you again someday. By
the way, I heard that the Chest Clam
you could pick up at Kyurarana Beach
will be gone after this season.
毎日が エブリデイの若者たちよ！\n突然の手紙 失礼するぜ。\n今年もついに オ:
Everyday is Everyday, young people!
Excuse the suddenness of this letter.
It's finally our season, the SizzSizz
summer! I'll be waiting for you with a
nice present at a hot space on the
northeast side of Kyurarana
Coast!Muron, the man of the sea
突然お手紙差し上げて ごめんなさい。\n私は 紅玉館に住む レイと申します。\n:
I am sorry to write to you on such
short notice. My name is Ray and I live
in Ruby Mansion. My brother is missing
and I am looking for a capable
adventurer to help me find him. I will
be waiting for you.
ボクは 困ったちゃんな女の子\nアマリリスさんに 協力させられてる\n善良なスラ:
I'm a good Slime who has been forced to
help a troubled girl named Amaryllis.
Adventurers, come meet her somewhere in
Wind Town Azlan Town of Orphea Glen
Castle Town Julet Mount Gatara.
アストルティアにいる 冒険者の皆さん！\nどうも はじめましてでンス！\nボクの:
Dear adventhurerth in Atholtia! Hello,
nith to meet you! If you are interethtedin the new location created by my
Mathter, pleath come to the teleportal
located in the Foretht Ruinth, eatht of
Gatara Fieldth! I look forward to your
vithit!
アストルティアの冒険者へ。\nうまのふんも たんまり手に入りましたからわたくし:
To the adventurers of Astoltia. I am
returning to Vana'diel, now that I have
a large amount of Horse Manure. I'm
going to start researching new black
magic with this wonderful magical
material. I will use this wonderful
material to research new black magic
right away.
皆さまのおかげで 無事に 第２回\nアストルティア・クイーン総選挙の\n結果発表:
Thanks to all of you, the 2nd Astoltia
Queen Election went by without a hitch
and we are pleased to announce the
results, so please come and visit me.
You'll also receive a present from the
queen, so please look forward to it!
アストルティアの冒険者へ。\nヴァナ・ディールの 偉大なる魔法博士を\n手伝う栄:
To the adventurers of Astoltia. I have
the honor of assisting the great doctor
of magic of Vana'diel. He is in Wind
Town Azlan or something like that, so
you'd better get a move on and come see
him. Furthermore, there is a curse on
this letter, and only we can break
it...
お前さんのおかげで ひと味ちがった\n白銀の星夜祭を 楽しませてもらったぜ。\n:
Thanks to you, I was able to enjoy a
different version of the Starry Night
Festival. As thanks, I've prepared a
special present for you, which you can
receive from the Travel Concierge!
P.S.: Even if you wear the Reindeer Suitafter the season, monsters won't appear.
皆さんのおかげで 今年も盛大に\n白銀の星夜祭を行うことができました。\n本当に:
Thanks to all of you, we were able to
hold another grand Starry Night
Festival this year. Thank you very
much! See you again and Merry
Christmas!
P.S.: Even if you wear the Reindeer Suitafter the season, monsters won't appear.
幸運な旅人さん こんにちは！\n突然のお手紙 失礼します。\n抽選の結果 あなた:
Hello, lucky traveler! Please excuse my
abrupt letter. As a result of a
lottery, you are invited to the "Starry
Night Festival", a celebration of
fairies! I'm hiding in a forest
somewhere, so if you find me, please
say the words to celebrate Christmas!
冒険者の皆さん はじめまして！\n私は まもの使いハウスの管理人をしているクラハ:
Greetings adventurers! My name is
Klaha, and I am the administrator of
Monster Master House. Would you like to
become a monster master? If you are
interested, please come to Orpha Hill
in the southeast of Orphea Region
West!Klaha, Monster Master
カジノ開店のお知らせ\nかねてより 準備を進めておりました\n娯楽島ラッカランの:
We are pleased to announce the opening
of our new Casino in Luckland Island.
We will do our best to meet your
expectations and look forward to your
continued patronage.
               Von Baldi, Casino Manager
今年も 夏が終わってしまうのう。\nだが お前さんたちのおかげで\n忘れられない:
Another summer is coming to an end. But
thanks to you, it has been an
unforgettable and enjoyable summer! I
hope we can spend another summer
together next year. By the way, the
Pirate Treasure you picked up at
Kyurarana Beach will be gone after this
season. Sorry about that.
拝啓 木々の緑も雨に色付く 今日この頃。私どもは 皆さまのおチカラ添えもあり\n:
Dear friends, the trees are turning
green with the rain. With the help of
all of you, we were able to
successfully celebrate our wedding.
From now on, we will work together to
build a bright home for our family.
Thank you for your continued
support.Messhi Minazuki
拝啓 木々の緑が目にまぶしい今日この頃。突然のお手紙 失礼いたします。\nこのた:
Dear Sir or Madam, The green of the
trees is Dazzling to the eyes these
days. I apologize for the suddenness of
this letter. I am writing to ask you
for a favor, and I am waiting for you
at the inn in North Port Lendor, so
please come and visit me. Please come
to the inn at North Port Lendor.
レンダーシア上陸に関する 特別な依頼が\n届きました。この依頼の報酬は\n港町レ:
We have received a special request for
the Lendersia landing. The reward for
this request is a Boarding Pass Voucher
for a liner between Port Lendor
and Lendersia. The World Association of
Innkeepers is in desperate need of the
cooperation of capable adventurers.
Please visit our information desk at
any of our inns around the world.
皆さまのおかげで 無事に\nアストルティア・クイーン総選挙の\n結果発表日を 迎:
Thanks to all of you, the Astoltia
Queen Election went by without a hitch
and we are pleased to announce the
results, so please come and visit me.
You'll also receive a present from the
queen, so please look forward to it!
皆さま はじめまして。この時期だけの\n特別なイベントへの ご招待です。\n風の:
Greetings, everyone. I'd like to invite
you to a very special Valentine's Day
Bento, just for this time of the year.
If you can find me anywhere in Wind
Town Azlan Town of Orphea Glen Castle
Town Julet Mount Gatara, please
say Happy Valentine's Day!
皆さんのおかげで 今年も無事\n白銀の星夜祭を行うことができました。\n本当に:
Thanks to all of you, we were able to
hold another successful Starry Night
Festival this year. Thank you so much!
...Oh yeah. Please note that the effect
of Santa Hat will disappear after this
period! See you again! Merry Christmas!
全国の旅人さん こんにちは！\n突然のお手紙 失礼します。\nじつは 心優しい:
Hello, National Traveler! Please excuse
my sudden letter. I have a favor to ask
of you, kind-hearted travelers. I'm in
the woods of Astoltia, so please find
me and say those words to celebrate
Chrismas to me!
全国の旅人さん こんにちは！\n突然のお手紙 ごめんなさいカボ。\nじつは 旅人:
Hello, National Traveler! I'm sorry for
the sudden letter. I have a favor to
ask of you, travelers. I am waiting for
you at Lion Gate Treeshade Village
Pipi's Inn Mogare Camp Prayer Inn! I'll
be waiting for you at Lion Gate
Treeshade Village Pipi's Inn Mogare
Camp Prayer Inn!
ウリスさまが ふくびきで\n幸運を つかまれましたので\n幸運のおすそ分けとして:
As Mr. Ulis has found good luck in
lotteries, Travel Concierge is pleased
to send you 11 SP Lottery Tickets to
share his good fortune.
お久しぶりです トートです。\n風のウワサで 職業レベルが\n６６以上になったと:
It's me, Tote. It's been awhile.
I've heard rumors that you've reached atleast level 66 in one of your vocations!Actually, there's something I need to
talk to you about! Do you think you
could come to the Bag Workshop in
the well in Julet?
円盤の騎士 <pnplacehold>卿よ。\nそなたのおかげで われらが王国…:
<pnplacehold>, knight of the saucer. It
is thanks to you that we have been able
to save our kingdom, and indeed, the
entire world. On behalf of my people, I
thank you once again. Your name will be
forever remembered in the land of Moon
Carrot.
レース屋集団『ターボアクセル』が主催する時間制限付きの 激熱イベント\nドルボー:
Race Shop Group, "Turbo Axel", is
hosting a time-limited, heated event
called the Dolboard Race. Starting
today, races will be held on the
continent of Ogreed, so be sure to come!We are accepting entries at the entranceto Glen Castle Town in Glen East.
アラハギーロ王国の 東の海で\n正体不明の 遺跡島が発見されました。\n世界宿屋:
A strange island has been discovered offthe eastern coast of Al-Ahagiro. The
Association has begun their support to
search the island's ruins. Interested
adventurers are encouraged to come.
However, only those at least level 90
will be accepted.
果たし状 <pnplacehold>殿\n我が名は 天地雷鳴士 アサ:
A challenge to <pnplacehold>
My name is Asahi, a Druid. Chosen by theeight trigrams, I will show to you what
a Druid is capable of. Come to the
bridge near the Woodworking Guild in
Kamiharmui as a vocation level 50 or
higher.
ほまれ高き冒険者よ。ワシの名は総帥Ｍ。\nこのたび ワシは 有志を集めて\nアス:
My name is General M. I have gathered
together a group of volunteers to form
the Astoltia Defense Force. I ask you
to use your powers to save our world
from the crisis that has come upon it.
I will be waiting for you at the
Defense Force Headquarters that I have
opened in the tavern of Verinard
Kingdom Castle Town.
お久しぶりです トートです。\n風のウワサによると 職業レベルが\n７５以上に:
It's me, Tote. It's been awhile.
I've heard rumors that you've reached atleast level 75 in one of your vocations!I have a favor I need to ask. Do you
think you could come to the Bag Workshopin Julet's well?
キーエンブレムを １つ以上持っている\n将来有望な 冒険者の諸君よ！\n君たちの:
To all promising adventurers who have
at least one Key Emblem! Are you
interested in wielding your brilliance
in a Batoen fight? If you are
interested, please come to the Legends
Headquarters at the North Port Lendor
Inn!
＼＼★当選通知のご案内★／／\nお め で と う ご ざ い ま す！ア:
Congratulations to you! You have been
selected as the winner of the "Grand
Gratitude" campaign
sponsored by the World Association of
Innkeepers! Our representative, Lynx,
will be waiting for you at the Gran
Zedora Kingdom Inn!
突然のお手紙に びっくりされましたか？\nじつは 僕 一生懸命修行したおかげで\:
Were you surprised by my sudden letter?
The truth is, thanks to my hard work,
I've finally been able to unlock my
skills! You can unlock more than 160
additional skills. I will be waiting
for you at Alltrades Abbey.
わたくしは 魔封剣姫。六聖陣のひとりだ。勇者姫の盟友よ 貴公の実力を見込んで\n:
I am the Prison Princess, one of the SixSaints. I have a favor to ask you, the
ally of the Hero. Please come to the
cave located in the southern Landon
Mountains Summit. Fierce battles await
you there.
突然の手紙 失礼する。\nアスフェルド学園のバウンズという者だ。\n貴君の活躍の:
Excuse the abruptness of this letter. I
am Baunze from Asfeld Academy. I have
heard about your success. I have a
favor to ask of you. First, I would
like you to go to Gran Zedora Kingdom
and meet Demika at the Ship Bureau.
There, you will hear more about me.
<pnplacehold>様\n先日<pnplacehold>様宛てに お預かり:
Dear <pnplacehold>,
We have discovered a mysterious package
addressed to you the other day. Please
pick it up at the post office at your
earliest convenience.
旅人たちよ。私は 釣り老師ハルモス。\n多くの種類の魚を 釣ったものにたいして\:
Travelers. I am Old Fish Master Harmos,
and I have prepared a new reward for
those who have caught many kinds of
fish. I hope you will continue your
fishing adventures. If you want to hear
more about it, come to me south of Port
Town Lendor. I look forward to hearing
from those who want to master the art
of fishing.
新しくデフェル荒野に 派遣されました\nシスター・トニアと 申します。\n西にそ:
I am Sister Tonia, newly dispatched to
Defel Wilderness. I'm in front of the
giant tower towering to the west, and
I'm hearing a rasping scream coming
from inside the tower. I would like to
check it out, but I am powerless to
open the gate, and I am at a loss.
Please, adventurers, help us.
ありがとうございます <pnplacehold>さん！あなたのおかげで 私達は:
Thank you very much <pnplacehold>!
Thanks to you, we were able to overcome
the trial and take a new step forward.
We will continue to be a loving
couple. I look forward to your
continued support.
親愛なる盟友 <pnplacehold>よ。\nグランゼドーラ国王 アリオスであ:
Dear ally <pnplacehold>, I am Arios,
king of Gran Zedora. Now that peace has
come to all of Astoltia, I would like
to put a plan into action. It will take
some time, but could you please come to
the throne room of Gran Zedora Castle?
I will be waiting for you.
親愛なる盟友 <pnplacehold>へ。\nグランゼドーラ国王 アリオスであ:
Dear ally <pnplacehold>, I am Arios,
king of Gran Zedora. To celebrate the
peace that has come to Astoltia, collectkey emblems from 10 countries on the 5
continents to fill in the glowing
squares on your stamp card! Accomplish
this or the plan cannot proceed.
感謝を捧げるぜ <pnplacehold>！ \nお前さんのおかげで 星夜祭の夜:
We give you our thanks, <pnplacehold>!
Thanks to you, we were able to fill the
night sky of Starry Night Festival with
miracle stars. The stars fulfilled the
wishes of the children and did wonders
for you too. Please accept a special
present from the Travel Concierge.
たたた たいへんです！\nまた あの魔物たちが 広場に現れて\n今度は 子供たち:
Oh no, it's terrible! The monsters have
appeared in the plaza again, and this
time they have stolen the presents for
the children! <pnplacehold>, can you
please come to Starry Tree Plaza again?
１０周年 おめでとう！ 弟！\nこの すばらしい時を 一緒に迎えられて\n私は:
Happy 10th anniversary, brother! I am
the happiest sister in the world to be
able to share this wonderful time with
you! Thank you so much for everything.
Let's have many adventures in the
future. I will always love you!

interfere with Astoltia. Actually, I

超常現象の研究家 ティノイです。\nなんと 例の悪霊が また現れたと\nチササが:
It's me, Tino, the supernatural
researcher. Chisasa tells me that
spirit is back again. Could you
please help us with the treasure
again?! I'm too scared to even go
to the bathroom! I'll be waiting
at the Mining Guild in Gatara!
不思議の魔塔内にて入手した 竜のおまもりロイヤルチャームの一部の錬金効果が:
In the Mysterious Tower, some
obtained Lucky Dragon's Wings and
Sovereign's Seals had incorrect
effects. If affected, please speak
with Chacolot in the tower for a
replacement.
バージョン６完結を祝して……\nあなたという 英雄を見出し\n共に戦えたことは:
I congratulate you on the completion of
version 6...and am proud to have found
and fought alongside you, champion.
I know you will continue to play a
vital role in your adventures to come.
I'll always be watching over you.
                             From Yuliza
バージョン６が完結して なによりだ。\nだが その喜びよりも お前と過ごした\n:
I'm glad that version 6 is now complete.However, that joy is outweighed by the
sadness of having to say goodbye to our
days of adventure. If it's possible...
no, let's stop here. I am grateful for
the fate that brought us together.
                          From Lada Gart
祝・バージョン６完結！ めでてえぜ！\nアンタのおかげで アタシたちにとっても\:
Congrats on clearin' version 6!
Thanks to you, our adventure together
was unforgettable.
I hope it was the same for you, too.
No matter what, you'll always be our
sibling! And don't ya forget it!
            From Kabu, Nanna, and Doltam
皆さまのおかげで 無事に 第１２回\nアストルティア・クイーン コンテストの\n:
Thanks to all of you, the 12th Astoltia
Queen Contest went by without a hitch
and we are pleased to announce the
results, so please come and visit me.
You'll also receive a present from the
queen, so please look forward to it!
バージョン６ 完結おめでとう。\nあなたと出会えたことで 私はようやく\n自分を:
Congratulations on completing version 6.Meeting you has allowed me to finally
accept who I am. I will treasure that
experience for a long time to come. Youradventure with me has come to an end,
but I will continue to support you.
   From the second Time Sovereign, Hakuo
バージョン６が 閉幕いたしました。\n記念に ぱふぱふしちゃいます♥\n手紙から:
Version 6 has come to a close. I'm goingto do a Puff-puff to commemorate this
event.♥ Can you smell the perfume from
the letter? I want you to remember me
every time you smell it...
Please forgive my selfishness.
                  With love from Linashe
やあ バージョン６完結の 立役者さん。\n……キミは とても不思議な存在だ。\n:
Hello, star of Version 6 completion. Youare a very mysterious being... With my
foresight, I can easily turn unavoidabletragedies into a brilliant future. Let
the miracle that is you continue to pavethe way for the future.
                            From Fostail
バージョン６完結！ めでてえな！\nまだまだ 冒険は続けるんだろ？\n俺も一緒に:
Version 6 is complete! Congratulations!
You're still going on adventures, aren'tyou? I wish I could go with you...but I
can't leave Leone behind. I'll have to
act like a big brother this time. Enjoy
your adventures as much as we do!
             From the first Hero, Ashley
アストルティアの世界に 転生してすぐの\n状態で メインストーリーを進めると\n:
If you are new to the world of Astoltia,the main storyline may be too difficult
for you to follow. In such a case, take
quests and develop your character
sufficiently! If you are having trouble
on your adventure, here is some useful
information: https://sqex.to/SSKIP
バージョン６完結 本当におめでとう。\n一緒に過ごした冒険の日々で\nきみのまな:
Congratulations on the completion of
version 6. During our days of adventure
together, your eyes and your smile shonelike the stars in the sky. When I
learned the meaning of this feeling...I
felt like a real angel. Thank you.
                           From Lectalis
おっ疲れちゃ～ん！ 無事に 第１１回\nアストルティア・ナイト コンテストの\n:
Great job everyone! The 11th Astoltia
Knight Contest went by without a hitch!
Please come and visit me to see the
results! Of course, you'll receive a
present from the winning Knight, so
please look forward to it! I'll be
waiting!

Commander's Office in the Royal Army HQ
in Kimbel.
                            From Mereade
<pnplacehold>さん！\n私と いっしょに 跳びましょうっ！！\n:
<pnplacehold>!
Let's jump high together!
Meet me in South Port Lendor!!
           Chief Researcher of Megistris                                  Palmio
オッス！ 俺 グナールっていうッス！\nヴァレリア様から 大魔王就任祝いの\n贈:
Yo! Name's Gunnar! Miss Valeria left me
with a gift to celebrate your
inauguration as the Great Demon King!
Come on over to the workshop in
Valdista!
Alrighty then, be seein' ya!!
親愛なる <pnplacehold>へ\n冒険もいいけど たまには 息抜きしない:
To my dearest <pnplacehold>,
Adventuring is nice, but why not take a
break? I heard that you can ride a hot
air balloon in Pukuland. Why don't we gotogether? I'll be waiting at the second
floor reception in the Glitter Windmill
Tower. I can't wait!
<pnplacehold>よ。賢者ホーローじゃ。\n竜族の世界での冒険 お疲れさ:
<pnplacehold>! It's Hollow.
Great work on your adventures in the
world o' Nadravians. Why don't we chat
fer a bit? I'd like to hear all about
what ya saw. I'll be waiting for ya in
the center plaza in Gran Zedora Kingdom.See ya there!
<pnplacehold>村長 こんにちは。\n新エテーネの村に 新しい村人が来:
Greetings, <pnplacehold>. A new
villager has come to Ethene Village.
While repairing, we found something
quite interesting. I'd love to show you,so please meet me here in New Ethene
Village. Looking forward to seeing you!
＼＼★無料キャンペーンのご案内★／／\n早い者勝ち！ 人数限定！ 先着順！\n:
★ CONGRATULATIONS! ★        
Our early bird special! Limited slots
available! First come, first served!
Join our completely free campaign to
make your Mega Zoomstone even MORE
convenient! If interested, contact Lynx
at the Gran Zedora Kingdom inn!
管理端末ヨリ いんふぉめーしょん。\n闇ノ領界 下界ノ 危機れべる 上昇ニヨリ緊:

Emergency Battle Program on standby due
to rising threat in lower Dark Realm.
Waiting for Dragon Slayer in Utopia.
Program will start with following
password:
りゅうとうしがあらわれた！コマンド？
教団では ナドラガンドの魔物調査に\nご協力くださる冒険者を 募集しています。我:
The Order is recruiting adventurers to
assist in monster investigation. Those
who feel up to the task, please come to
the tavern in Ejarna. Those who assist
shall be rewarded.
 Nadraga Order's Realm Investigation
Team, Mofteka
わが巫女姫は チカラある勇士をお探しだ。しかし真の勇士は なかなか現れぬご様子。:
Our priestess is searching for strong
fighters, yet they are hard to come by.
Hearing rumors of a traveler, we've
decided to contact you directly via
letter. If you wish to answer this call,come to the abandoned house in Matil
Village in the Valley of Fire.
アストルティアのみんなに お願い！\n今 私たちが住む 妖精の国に\n大変なこと:
To everyone in Astoltia, please!
Something terrible has happened to our
Fairy Land and we're looking for
someone to listen to us. I'll be
waiting for you in South Port Lendor!
お元気ですか？\n風のウワサで 職業レベルが\n４６以上になったと 聞きました！:
It's me, Tote. It's been awhile.
I've heard rumors that you've reached atleast level 46 in one of your vocations!Actually, there's a favor I need to ask
of you... Do you think you could come
to the Bag Workshop in the well in
Julet?
屈強なる 冒険者たちへ！\n凍える季節 お前さんたちを 妖精の祭典\n『白銀の星:
To all brave adventurers! As the cold
season approaches, I invite you all to
the Starry Night Festival! Come and findme in Glen, Julet, Azlan, Gatara, or
Orphea!
冒険者さん 本当に ありがとうカボ。\n今回のことで ３党とも 反省したカボ。\:
Thanks so much! All three groups
reflected on what happened. They'll try
their best to get along and not fight.
Halloween's just the best!
Dummy or...no, Trick or Treat!!
※キャラクターの種族や性別の見た目によって\n見え方が異なる場合がございます。\:
・Item appearance may differ depending on your
character's race or gender.
・Please be careful not to discard any items before
use. If needed, items may be reobtained from the

・Items with no purchase history cannot be reobtained
via Free Pass.
・Emotes with random action timing cannot be set to

・DQX Shop items cannot be traded, listed on the

メリークリスマス！\n今年も楽しい いい祭りだったぜ。\nクリスマスといえば プ:
Merry Christmas! The festival this year
was a blast. Speaking of Christmasー
that means presents, and I've got
something special, just for you! It's
included with this letter.

お前さんたちのおかげで 今年も無事に\n『白銀の星夜祭』を 開催することが\nで:

Well, see ya next year!
